alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:13PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Oldham and Deaf Smith Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 312 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles south of Vega to 11 miles west of Simms. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vega, Adrian, Glenrio, Boys Ranch, Bootleg, Wildorado and Simms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
